article_title: An Options Strategy to Protect Unvested Stock
article_text:
The client was a successful tech entrepreneur who sold his business for $27 million in 2013.

The company that bought the client's firm paid him one third of the purchase price in cash, and the other $18 million in company stock.

Rather than being issued as a lump sum, though, the shares were to be allotted in six tranches over the...

twitter.description: Adviser Brendan Connaughton used a series of options contracts to protect the value of the shares his client received after selling his firm.
twitter.title: An Options Strategy to Protect Unvested Stock

image.alt: An Options Strategy to Protect Unvested Stock
